mean_cn: adj. 优雅的，优美的，得体的
mean_en: moving in a controlled, attractive way or having a smooth, attractive form; polite and kind in your behaviour, especially in a difficult situation
sentence: She is such a graceful and beautiful actress!
sentence_trans: 她是一个如此优雅美丽的演员！
word_etyma: grace优雅 + ful形容词后缀：…的 → graceful优雅的
